review_blob: Actually drank it in China, outside of the Brewery. OK beer, but tasted better because I was only paying about $1 for a 40oz bottle. Gave me a doozy of a hangover and did not go with any food I ate, I wouldnt drink it anywhere but in China!!

GREAT ON TAP. Not that enjoyable out of a bottle. Great head, good initial taste, aftertaste is a little rough, but goes away after the first one. Great aroma from the tap and looks as a beer should look coming from the tap..

This is one of the most refreshing beers around. I have the good luck of being able to drink the real ASAHI
not the imported stuff. The difference is HUGE. This is a beer with a great first sensation and a pleasant after taste. Excellent with almost any type of food, and great on a hot summer day!!
